title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Junior Ranger Badge   Become an expert on Martin Van Buren and Lindenwald through the Junior Ranger Program. Make sure to stop by the Visitors Center once you arrive to pick up the booklet. During your visit complete the booklet by watching the short 10 minute film in the Visitors Center, walking the Wayside Path, or taking a tour of Lindenwald. Once you have finished your booklet stop back in the Visitors Center so a park ranger can review your finished booklet with you. If your booklet is finished you will receive your badge and certificate making you a Junior Ranger of Martin Van Buren National Historic Site. If you would like to work on the booklet before you arrive click here for kindergarten-2nd grade or click here for 3rd grade and up.
